tool_description: Extremely Comprehensive database of Indian chemists or pharmacies. Get store easily by id, city, pin code.
name: Chemist database
title: Chemist database

api_list.name: Search by city pin
api_list.description: search chemist shop by entering Pin code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chemist-database.p.rapidapi.com/pin/152116"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chemist-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chemist-database.p.rapidapi.com/pin/{pin_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chemist-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
